CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.1.2.1a, patientbirthdateformat (3N) --> Value should be 102 AND B.1.2.1b, patientbirthdate (8N) --> convert to CCYYMMDD
E2B (R3): D.2.1 Date of Birth Conformance: Optional Data Type: Date / Time OID: None Value Allowed: See Appendix II for further information. nullFlavor: MSK
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A full precision date should be used (i.e., day, month, year). If the full date of birth is unknown, an approximate age can be used
CustomField.label: Patient Birthdate
